GV05brupsb1u:818: bhavaty ātmanā, parāsya dviṣan bhrātṛvyo bhavati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.7 ||
GV05brupsb1u:821: āsanyamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhāntarbilasthaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti /
GV05brupsb1u:822: tathetyevaṃ śaraṇamupagatebhyaḥ sa eṣa prāṇo mukhya udagāyadityādi pūrvavat /
GV05brupsb1u:823: pāpmanāvivyatsanvedhanaṃ kartumiṣṭavantaste ca doṣāsaṃsargiṇaṃ santaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇam /
GV05brupsb1u:824: svena āsaṅgadoṣeṇa vāgādiṣu labdhaprasarāstadabhyāsānuvṛttyā saṃsrakṣyamāṇā vineśurvinaṣṭā vidhvastāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:826: iti dṛṣṭānta ucyate- sa yathā sa dṛṣṭānto yathā loke 'śmānaṃ pāṣāṇamṛtvā gatvā prāpya,
GV05brupsb1u:827: loṣṭaḥ pāṃsupiṇḍaḥ pāṣāṇacūrṇanāyāśmani nikṣiptaḥ svayaṃ vidhvaṃseta vistraṃseta vicūrṇībhavet,
GV05brupsb1u:829: vidhvaṃsamānā viśeṣeṇa dhvaṃsamānā viṣvañco nānāgatayo vineśurvinaṣṭā yataḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:830: tatastasmādāsuravināśāddevatvapratibandhabhūtebhyaḥ svābhāvikāsaṅgajanitapāpmabhyo viyogād asaṃsargadharmimukhyaprāṇāśrayabalād devā vāgādayaḥ prakṛtā abhavat /
GV05brupsb1u:832: pūrvamaṣyagnyādyātmana eva santaḥ svābhāvikena pāpmanā tiraskṛtavijñānāḥ piṇḍamātrābhimānā āsan /
GV05brupsb1u:836: yathā purākalpena varṇitaḥ pūrvayajamāno 'tikrāntakālikaḥ etāmevākhyāyikārūpāṃ śrutiṃ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva krameṇa vāgādidevatāḥ parīkṣya,
GV05brupsb1u:837_1: hitvā vairājapiṇḍābhimānaṃ vāgādyagnyādyātmaviṣayaṃ vartamānaprajāpatitvaṃ śāstraprakāśitaṃ pratipannaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:839: parā cāsyā prajāpatitvapratipakṣabhūtaḥ pāpmā dviṣanbhrātṛvyo bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:846: iti tadupapattinirūpaṇāya yasmādayaṃ vāgādīnāṃ piṇḍādīnāṃ ca sādhāraṇa ātmā,
GV05brupsb1u:850: te hocuḥ -- kva nu so 'bhūd yo na ittham asakteti |

GV05brupsb1u:861: katham? ayamāsye 'ntariti, āsye mukhe ya ākāśastasminnantarayaṃ pratyakṣo vartata iti /
GV05brupsb1u:862: sarvo hi loko vicāryādhyavasyati, tathā devāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:863: yasmādayamantarākāśe vāgādyātmatvena viśeṣamanāśritya vartamāna upalabdho devaiḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:866: kathamāṅgirasaḥ? prasiddhaṃ hyetadaṅgānāṃ kāryakaraṇalakṣaṇānāṃ rasaḥ sāra ātmetyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:874: kiṃ tvāṅgirasatvena vāgādīnāmātmatvoktyā vāgādidvāreṇa śavasṛṣṭitatspṛṣṭerivāśuddhatā śaṅkyate- ityāha- śuddha eva praṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:878: sā vā eṣā devatā dūr nāma |

GV05brupsb1u:882: BrhUpBh_1,3.9 sā vā eṣā devatā dūrnāma /
GV05brupsb1u:883: yaṃ prāṇaṃ prāpyāśmānamiva loṣṭavadvidhvastā asurāstaṃ parāmṛśati seti /
GV05brupsb1u:885: devatā ca sā syāt, upāsanakriyāyāḥ karmabhāvena guṇabhūtatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:890: ityāha- dūraṃ dūreḥ hi yasmādasyāḥ prāṇadevatāyāḥ mṛtyurāsaṅgalakṣaṇaḥ pāpmā /
GV05brupsb1u:891: asaṃśleṣadharmitvātprāṇasya samīpasthāsyāpi dūratā mṛtyostasmād dūrityevaṃ khyātiḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:893: viduṣaḥ phalamucyate- dūraṃ ha vā asmānmṛtyurbhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:894: asmādevaṃvidaḥ, ya evaṃ veda tasmādevamiti prakṛtaṃ viśuddhiguṇopetaṃ prāṇamupāsta ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:895_0: upāsanaṃ nāma upāsyārthavāde yathā devatādisvarūpaṃ śrutyā jñāpyate tathā manasopagamya
GV05brupsb1u:899: sā vā eṣā devatā dūraṃ ha vā asmānmṛtyurbhavatītyuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:900: kathaṃ punarevaṃvido dūraṃ mṛtyurbhavati? ityucyate- evaṃvittvavirodhāt /
GV05brupsb1u:901: indriyaviṣayasaṃsargāsaṅgajo hi pāpmā prāṇātmābhimānino hi virudhyate,
GV05brupsb1u:904: tasmādevaṃvidaḥ pāpmā dūraṃ bhavatīti yuktaṃ virodhāt /
GV05brupsb1u:908: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatya yatrāsāṃ diśām antas tad gamayāṃ cakāra |
GV05brupsb1u:910: tasmān na janam iyān nāntam iyān net pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum anvavāyānīti || BrhUp_1,3.10 ||
GV05brupsb1u:913: etāsāṃ vāgādīnāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyuṃ svābhāvikājñānaprayuktendriyaviṣayasaṃsargāsaṅgajanitena hi pāpmanā sarvo mriyate,
GV05brupsb1u:916: virodhādeva tu pāpmaivaṃvido dūraṃ gato bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:918: ityucyate- yatra yasminnāsāṃ prācyādīnāṃ diśāmanto 'vasānaṃ tattatra gamayāñcakāra gamanaṃ kṛtavānityetat /
GV05brupsb1u:928: tatsaṃsarge pāpmanā saṃsargaḥ kṛtaḥ syātpāpmāśrayo hi saḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:929: tajjananivāsaṃ cāntaṃ digantaśabdavācyaṃ neyājjanaśūnyamapi, janamapi taddeśaviyuktamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:932: anu ava ayānītyanugaccheyamiti, evaṃ bhīto na janamantaṃ ceyāditi pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ //10//
GV05brupsb1u:935: sā vā eṣā devataitāsāṃ devatānāṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum apahatyāthainā mṛtyum atyavahat || BrhUp_1,3.11 ||
GV05brupsb1u:937: BrhUpBh_1,3.11 sā vā eṣā devatā, tadetatprāṇātmajñānakarmaphalaṃ vāgādīnāmagnyādyātmatvamucyate /
GV05brupsb1u:938: athainā mṛtyumatyavahat tasmādādhyātmikaparicchedakaraḥ pāpmā mṛtyuḥ prāṇātmavijñānenapahatastasmātsaprāṇo 'pahantā pāpmano mṛtyoḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:939: tasmātsa eva prāṇa enā vāgādidevatāḥ prakṛtaṃ pāpmānaṃ mṛtyumatītya avahatprāpayatsvaṃ svamaparicchinnamagnyādidevātātmarūpam //11//
GV05brupsb1u:942: sā vai vācam eva prathamām atyavahat |
GV05brupsb1u:943: sā yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata so 'gnir abhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:944: so 'yam agniḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto dīpyate || BrhUp_1,3.12 ||
GV05brupsb1u:951: ityucyate- sā vāgyadā yasminkāle pāpmānaṃ mṛtyum atyamucyatātītyāmucyata mocitā svayameva,
GV05brupsb1u:957: idānīṃ tu mṛtyuṃ pareṇa dīpyate mṛtyuviyogāt //12//
GV05brupsb1u:961: sa yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa vāyur abhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:962: so 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntaḥ pavate || BrhUp_1,3.13 ||
GV05brupsb1u:970: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa ādityo 'bhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:971: so 'sāv ādityaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntas tapati || BrhUp_1,3.14 ||
GV05brupsb1u:977: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata tā diśo 'bhavan |
GV05brupsb1u:978: tā imā diśaḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrāntāḥ || BrhUp_1,3.15 ||
GV05brupsb1u:985: tad yadā mṛtyum atyamucyata sa candramā abhavat |
GV05brupsb1u:986: so 'sau candraḥ pareṇa mṛtyum atikrānto bhāti |
GV05brupsb1u:987: evaṃ ha vā enam eṣā devatā mṛtyum ativahati ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,3.16 ||
GV05brupsb1u:991: evamenaṃ vartamānayajamānamapi ha vā eṣā prāṇadevatā mṛtyumativahati vāgādyagnyādibhāvena /
GV05brupsb1u:997: yad dhi kiñcānnam adyate 'nenaiva tad adyate |
GV05brupsb1u:1001: 3.17 yathā vāgādibhirātmārthamāgānaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇaḥ sarvaprāṇasādhāraṇaṃ prājāpatyaphalamāgānaṃ kṛtvā triṣu pamāneṣu,

GV05brupsb1u:1017: nanvavadhāraṇamayuktaṃ prāṇenaiva tadadyata iti, vāgādīnāmapi annanimittopakāradarśanāt /

GV05brupsb1u:1029: evaṃ ha vā enaṃ svā abhisaṃviśanti bhartā svānāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ puraetā bhavaty annādo 'dhipatir ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brupsb1u:1030: ya u haivaṃvidaṃ sveṣu pratir bubhūṣati na haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati |
GV05brupsb1u:1031: atha ya evaitam anubhavati yo vaitam anu bhāryān bubhūrṣati sa haivālaṃ bhāryebhyo bhavati || BrhUp_1,3.18 ||
GV05brupsb1u:1039: yadannaṃ prāṇasthitikaramadyate loke tatsarvamātmana ātmārthamāgāsīḥ āgītavānasi āgānenātmasātkṛtamityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1041: ato 'nu paścānnosmānasminnanne ātmārthe tavānne ābhajasva ābhājayasva /
GV05brupsb1u:1044: itara āha- te yūyaṃ yadyannārthino vai, mā māmabhisaṃviśata samantato māmābhimukhyena niviśata /
GV05brupsb1u:1045: ityevamuktavati prāṇe tathetyevamiti, taṃ prāṇaṃ pariveṣṭya niviṣṭavanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1046: tathā niviṣṭānāṃ prāṇānujñayā teṣāṃ prāṇe naivādyamānaṃ prāṇasthitikaraṃ sadannaṃ tṛptikaraṃ bhavati na svātantryeṇa /
GV05brupsb1u:1048: tadeva cāha- tasmādyasmātprāṇāśrayatayaiva prāṇānujñayābhisanniviṣṭā vāgādidevatāḥ tasmādyadannamanena prāṇenātti lokastenānnenaitā vāgādyāstṛpyanti /
GV05brupsb1u:1049: vāgādyāśrayaṃ prāṇaṃ yo veda vāgādayaśca pañca prāṇāśrayā iti tamapyevamevaṃ ha vai svā jñātasya abhisaṃviśanti vāgādaya iva prāṇam /
GV05brupsb1u:1051: abhisanniviṣṭānāṃ ca svānāṃ prāṇavadeva vāgādīnāṃ svānnena bhartā bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:1052: tathā śreṣṭhaḥ puro 'grata etā gantā bhavati vāgādīnāmiva prāṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1054: adhipatiradhiṣṭhāya ca pālayitā svatantraḥ patiḥ prāṇavadeva vāgādīnām /
GV05brupsb1u:1055: ya evaṃ prāṇaṃ veda tasyaitadyathoktaṃ phalaṃ bhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:1056: kiñca ya u haivaṃvidhaṃ prāṇavidaṃ prati sveṣu jñātīnāṃ madhye pratiḥ pratikūlo bubhūrṣati pratispardhī bhavitumicchati,
GV05brupsb1u:1058: prāṇapratispardhino na haivālaṃ na paryāpto bhāryebhyo bharaṇīyebhyo bhavati bhartumityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1059: atha punarya evaṃ jñātīnāṃ madhye evaṃvidaṃ vāgādaya iva prāṇam anu anugato bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:1062: sa haivālaṃ paryāpto bhāryebhyo bharaṇīyebhyo bhavati bhartuṃ netaraḥ svatantraḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:1067: anantaraṃ ca vāgādīnāṃ prāṇādhīnatoktā sā ca kathamupapādanīyā? ityāha-

GV05brupsb1u:1107: tatkatham? ityāha- tasyā vāco bṛhatyā ṛca eṣa prāṇaḥ patiḥ /

GV05brupsb1u:1169: ya evametadyathoktaṃ sāma prāṇaṃ veda-ā prāṇātmābhimānābhivyakterupāste ityarthaḥ //22//

GV05brupsb1u:2344: asyā brahmavidyāyāḥ sarvabhāvāpattiḥ phalamityetasyārthasya draḍhimne mantrānudāharati śrutiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2346: tad brahma etadātmānameva'ahamasmi'iti paśyannetasmādeva brahmaṇo darśanādṛṣṭirvāmadevākhyaḥ pratipede ha pratipannavānkila /
GV05brupsb1u:2350: paśyansarvātmabhāvaṃ phalaṃ pratipeda ityasmātprayogād brahmavidyāsahāyasādhanasādhyaṃ mokṣaṃ darśayati;
GV05brupsb1u:2355: tadutthāpanāyāha- tadidaṃ prakṛtaṃ brahma yatsarvabhūtānupraviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭikriyādiliṅgam,
GV05brupsb1u:2356_0: etarhyetasminnapi vartamānakāle yaḥ kaścidvyāvṛttabāhyautsukya ātmānamevaivaṃ veda'ahaṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2357: na hi mahāvīryeṣu vāmaḍhevādiṣu hīnavīryeṣu vā vārtamānikeṣu manuṣyeṣubrahyaṇo viśeṣastadvijhānasya vāsti /
GV05brupsb1u:2358_0: vārtamānikeṣu puruṣeṣu tu bahyavidyāphale anaikāntikatā śaḍkyata ityata āha-tasya
GV05brupsb1u:2358_1: ha brahyavijhāturyathotkena vidhinā devā mahāvīryāśca nāpi abhūtatya.abhavanāya brahyāsarvamāvasya,
GV05brupsb1u:2360: brahyāvidyāphalaprāpyau vidhnakaraṇe devādaya īśata iti kā śaḍkā?
GV05brupsb1u:2362: “brahyacaryeṇa ṛpibhyo yajhena devabhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhyaḥ“iti hi jāyamānamevarṇavantaṃ puruṣaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2364: ityādlokaśruteścātmano vṛttiparipipālayiṣayādhamarṇānivaṃ devāḥ paratantrānmanuṣyānpratyamṛtatvaprāptiṃ prati vidhnaṃ kuryuriti nyāyyaivaiṣā śaḍkā /
GV05brupsb1u:2366: mahattarāṃ hi vṛttiṃ karmādhīnāṃ darśayṣyati devādīnāṃ bahupaśusamatayaikaikasya puruṣasya /
GV05brupsb1u:2367: “tasmāndepāṃ tanna priyaṃ yadetanmanudhyā vidyāḥ“(1 / 4 / 10) iti hahi vakṣyati /
GV05brupsb1u:2368: “yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭimicchedevaṃ haivaṃvide sarvāṇi bhūtānyariṣṭimicchanti“(1 / 4 / 16) iti ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2370: tasmādbrahyāvido brahyavidyāphalarprāpta prati kuryureva vidhnaṃ devāḥ, prabhāvavantaśca hi te /
GV05brupsb1u:2375: eṣāṃ hi phalasampattivipattihetutvaṃ śāstre loke ca prasidvam /
GV05brupsb1u:2382: karma hi śubhāśubhaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ devakāleśvarādikārakamanapekṣya nātmānaṃ prati labhate,
GV05brupsb1u:2385: tasmātkriyānuguṇā hi deveśvarādaya iti karmasu tāvanna phalaprāptiṃ pratyavisrambhaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2387: karmakāladaivadravyādisvabhāvānāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvastvaniyato durvijñeyaśceti tatkṛto moho lokasya - karmaiva kārakaṃ nānyatphalaprāptāviti kecitaṃ;
GV05brupsb1u:2392: tatra karmaṇaḥ prādhānyamaṅgīkṛtya vedasmṛtivādāḥ -“puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena“(bṛ.u.3 / 2 / 13) ityādayaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2397: avidyāpagamamātratvād brahmaprāptiphalasya - yaduktaṃ brahmaprāptiphalaṃ prati devā vighnaṃ kuryuriti,
GV05brupsb1u:2400: katham? yathā loke draṣṭuścakṣuṣa ālokena saṃyogo yatkālaḥ, tatkāla eva rūpābhivyaktiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2401: evamātmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ yatkālam, tatkāla eva tadviṣayajñānatirobhāvaḥ syāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2402: ato brahmavidyāyāṃ satyāmavidyākāryānupapatteḥ pradīpa iva tamaḥkāryasya,
GV05brupsb1u:2403: kena kasya vighnaṃ kuryurdevāḥ - yatrātmatvameva devānāṃ brahmavidaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2404: tadetadāha - ātmā svarūpaṃ dhyeyaṃ yattatsarvaśāstrairvijñeyaṃ brahma,
GV05brupsb1u:2409: ato nātmanaḥ pratikūlatve devānāṃ prayatnaḥ sambhavati /
GV05brupsb1u:2412: na tviha vidyāsamakāla ātmabhūte deśakālanimittānantarite, avasarānupapatteḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2413: evaṃ tarhi vidyāpratyayasantatyabhāvād viparītapratyayatatkāryayośca darśanād antya evātmapratyayo 'vidyānivartako na tu pūrva iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2415: yadi hi prathama ātmaviṣayaḥ pratyayo 'vidyāṃ na nivartayati, tathāntyo 'pi, tulyaviṣayatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2416: evaṃ tarhi santato 'vidyānivartako na vicchinna iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2418: na hi jīvanādihetuke pratyaye sati vidyāpratyayasantatirupapadyate, virodhāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2421: iyatāṃ pratyayānāṃ santatiravidyāyā nivartiketyanavadhāraṇācchāstrārtho nāvadhriyeta, taccāniṣṭam /
GV05brupsb1u:2425: evaṃ tarhyanivartaka eveti cet? na,“tasmāttatsarvamabhavat“(bṛ.u.1 / 4 / 10) iti śruteḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2432: ya evāvidyādidoṣanivṛttiphalakṛtpratyaya ādyo 'ntyaḥ santato 'santato vā sa eva vidyetyabhyupagamānna codyasyāvatāragandho 'pyasti /
GV05brupsb1u:2434: yena karmaṇā śarīramārabdhaṃ tadviparītapratyayadoṣanimittatvāttasya tathābhūtasyaiva viparītapratyayadoṣasaṃyuktasya phaladāne sāvarthyamiti,
GV05brupsb1u:2435: yāvaccharīrapātaḥ tāvatphalopabhogāṅgatayā viparītapratyayaṃ rāgādidoṣaṃ ca tāvanmātramākṣipatyeva,
GV05brupsb1u:2437: tena na tasya nivartukā vidyā, avirodhāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2438: kiṃ tarhi svāśrayādeva svātmavirodhyavidyākāryaṃ yadutpitsu tanniruṇāddhi, anāgatatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2440: kiñca, na ca viparītapratyayo vidyāvata utpadyate, nirviṣayatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2441: anavadhṛtaviṣayaviśeṣasvarūpaṃ hi sāmānyamātramāśritya viparītapratyaya utpadyamāna utpadyate,
GV05brupsb1u:2448: samyagjñāne 'pyavisrambhācchāstrārthavijñānādau pravṛttirasamañjasā syātsarvaṃ ca pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ sampadyeta pramāṇāpramāṇayorviśeṣānupapatteḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2450: jñānotpatteḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ tatkālajanmāntarasañcitānāṃ vināśaḥ siddho bhavati phalaprāptivighnaniṣedhaśrutereva /
GV05brupsb1u:2461: yattu ṛṇaiḥ pratibadhyata iti, tanna, avidyāvadvipayatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2463: 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet'(4 / 3 / 31) iti hi vakṣyati /
GV05brupsb1u:2465: tatrāvidyākṛtānekakārakāpekṣaṃ darśanādikarma tatkṛtaṃ phalaṃ ca darśayati,
GV05brupsb1u:2471: tadyathehaiva tāvat - atha yaḥ kaścidabrahmavid anyāmātmāno vyatiriktāṃ yāṃ kāñciddevatām,
GV05brupsb1u:2472: upāste stutinamaskārayāgabalyupahārapraṇidhānādinā upa āste - anyo 'sāvanātmā mattaḥ pṛthak,
GV05brupsb1u:2474: mayāsmai ṛṇivatpratikartavyam - ityevampratyayo veda vijānāti tattvam /
GV05brupsb1u:2479: etasya hyaviduṣo varṇāśramādipravibhāgavato 'dhikṛtasya karmaṇo vidyāsahitasya kevalasya ca śāstroktasya kāryaṃ manuṣyatvādiko brahmānta utkarṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2480: śāstroktaviparītasya ca svābhāvikasya kāryaṃ manuṣyatvādika eva sthāvarānto 'pakarṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2481: yathā caitattathā“atha trayo vāva lokāḥ” (1 / 5 / 16) ityādinā vakṣyāmaḥ kṛtsnenaivādhyāyaśeṣeṇa /
GV05brupsb1u:2484: yathā caiṣor'thaḥ kṛtsnasya śāstrasya tathā pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2486_0: tasmādavidyāvantaṃ puruṣaṃ prati devā īśata eva vighnaṃ kartumanugrahaṃ cetyetaddarśayati
GV05brupsb1u:2486_1: - yathā ha vai loke bahavo go-aśvādayaḥ paśavo manuṣyaṃ svāminamātmano 'dhiṣṭhātāraṃ
GV05brupsb1u:2486_2: bhuñjyuḥ pālayeyurevaṃ bahupaśusthānīya ekaiko 'vidvānpuruṣo devān - devāniti pitrādyupalakṣaṇārtham
GV05brupsb1u:2487: ima indrādayo 'nye matto mameśitāro bhṛtya ivāhameṣāṃ stutinamaskārejyādinārādhanaṃ kṛtvābhyudayaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ ca tatprattaṃphalaṃ prāpsyāmītyevamabhisandhiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2488: tatra loke bahupaśumato yathaikasminneva paśāvādīyamāne vyāghrādināpahiyamāṇe mahadapriyaṃ bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:2489: tathā bahupaśusthānīya ekasminpuruṣe paśubhāvād vyuttiṣṭhatyapriyaṃ bhavatīti,
GV05brupsb1u:2490: kiṃ citraṃ devānāṃ bahupaśvapaharaṇa iva kuṭuṃbinaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2491: tasmādeṣāṃ devānāṃ tanna priyam, kiṃ tat?
GV05brupsb1u:2492: yadetadbrahmātmatattvaṃ kathañcana manuṣyā vidyurvijānīyuḥ tathā ca smaraṇamanugītāsu bhagavato vyāsasya - “kriyāvadbhirhi kaunteya devalokaḥ samāvṛtaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2496: yaṃ tu mumocayiṣanti taṃ śraddhādibhiryokṣyanti viparītamaśraddhādibhiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2497: tasmānmumukṣurdevārādhanaparaḥ śraddhābhaktiparaḥ praṇayo 'pramādī syādvidyāprāptiṃ ati vidyāṃ pratīti vā kākvaitatpradarśitaṃ bhavati devāpriyavākyena //10//
GV05brupsb1u:2500: brahma vā idam agra āsīd ekam eva |
GV05brupsb1u:2503: yāny etāni devatrā kṣatrāṇīndro varuṇaḥ somo rudraḥ parjanyo yamo mṛtyur īśāna iti |
GV05brupsb1u:2505: tasmād brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaṃ adhastād upāste rājasūye |
GV05brupsb1u:2508: tasmād yady api rājā paramatāṃ gacchati brahmaivāntata upaniśrayati svāṃ yonim |
GV05brupsb1u:2509: ya u enaṃ hinasti svāṃ sa yonim ṛcchati |
GV05brupsb1u:2510: sa pāpīyān bhavati yathā śreyāṃsaṃ hiṃsitvā || BrhUp_1,4.11 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2522: iha tu sa evāmidhīyate 'viduṣaḥ karmādhikārahetupradarśanāya- brahma vā idamagra āsīdyadagniṃ sṛṣṭvā agnirūpāpannaṃ brahma /
GV05brupsb1u:2526: tadbrahmaikaṃ kṣatrādiparipālayitrādiśūnyaṃ sadaṃ na vyabhavat- na vibhūtavat,
GV05brupsb1u:2528: tatastadbrahma'brāhmaṇo 'smi mametthaṃ kartavyam'iti brāhmaṇajātinimittaṃ karma cikīrṣu-ātmanaḥ karmakartṛtvavibhūtyai śreyorūpaṃ praśastarūpam atyasṛjatātiśayenāsṛjata-sṛṣṭavat /
GV05brupsb1u:2531: tadvyaktibhedena pradarśayati-yānyetāni prasiddhāni loke devatrā deveṣu kṣatrāṇīti /
GV05brupsb1u:2532: jātyākhyāyāṃ pakṣe bahuvacanasmaraṇād vyaktibahutvādvā bhedopacāreṇa bahuvacanam /
GV05brupsb1u:2534: ityāhatatrābhipiktā eva viśeṣato nirdiśyante-indro devānāṃ rājā,
GV05brupsb1u:2544: yasmādbrahmaṇātiśayena sṛṣṭaṃ kṣatraṃ tasmātkṣatrātparaṃ nāsti brāhmaṇajāterapi niyansṛ /
GV05brupsb1u:2547: kṣatra eva tadātmīyaṃ yaśaḥ khyātirūpaṃ brahmeti dadhāti sthāpayati /
GV05brupsb1u:2548: rājasūyābhiṣiktenāsandyāṃ sthitena rājñā āmantrito brahmanniti ṛtvikpunastaṃ pratyāha“tvaṃ rājanbrahmāsi“iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2551: tasmādyadyati rājā paramatāṃ rājasūyābhiṣekaguṇaṃ gacchatyāpnoti brahmaiva brāhmaṇajātimedha,
GV05brupsb1u:2554: yastu punarbalābhimānātsvāṃ yoniṃ brāhmaṇajātiṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ya u enaṃ hinasti hiṃsati nyagbhāvena paśyati,
GV05brupsb1u:2555: svāmātmāyāmeva sa yonimṛcchati-svaṃ prasavaṃ vicchinatti vināśayati-svaṃ prasavaṃ vicchinatti vināśayati /
GV05brupsb1u:2557: pūrvamapi kṣatriyaḥ pāpa eva krūratvādātmaprasavahiṃsayā sutarām /
GV05brupsb1u:2558: yathā loke śreyāṃsaṃ praśastataraṃ hiṃsitvā paribhūya pāpataro bhavati tadvat //11//
GV05brupsb1u:2564: yāny etāni devajātāni gaṇaśa ākhyāyante vasavo rudrā ādityā viśve devā maruta iti || BrhUp_1,4.12 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2566: BrhUpBh_1,4.12 sa naiva vyabhavat, karmaṇe brahma tathā navyabhavat, vittopārjayiturabhāvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2570: ya ete devajātibhedā ityarthaḥ;gaṇaśo gaṇaṃ gaṇam,
GV05brupsb1u:2572: gaṇaprāyā hi viśaḥ, prāyeṇa saṃhatā hi vittopārjane samarthāḥ na ekaikaśaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2584: iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yad idaṃ kiñca || BrhUp_1,4.13 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2588: sa śaudraṃ varṇamasṛjata- śūdra eva śaudraḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2590: kaḥ punarasau śaudro varṇo yaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:2591: pūṣaṇam- puṇyatīti pūṣā kaḥ punarasau pūṣā?
GV05brupsb1u:2593: svayameva nirvacanamāha- iyaṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ puṣyati yadidaṃ kiñca //13//
GV05brupsb1u:2598: tad etat kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ yad dharmaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2602: yo vai sa dharmaḥ satyaṃ vai tat |
GV05brupsb1u:2603: tasmāt satyaṃ vadantam āhur dharmaṃ vadatīti |
GV05brupsb1u:2605: etad dhy evaitad ubhayaṃ bhavati || BrhUp_1,4.14 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2607: BrhUpBh_1,4.14 sa caturaḥ sṛṣṭvāpi varṇānnaiva vyabhavat, ugratvātkṣatrasyāniyatāśaṅkayā /
GV05brupsb1u:2609: dharmam;tadetacchreyorūpaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ kṣatrasya kṣatraṃ kṣatrasyāpi niyantṛ,
GV05brupsb1u:2611: yaddharmo yo dharmaḥ;tasmātkṣatrasyāpi niyantṛtvāddharmātparaṃ nāsti;tena hi niyamyante sarve /
GV05brupsb1u:2613: ityucyate- atho apyabalīyāndurbalataro balīyāṃsamātmano balavattaramapyāśaṃsate kāmayate jetuṃ dharmeṇa balena;
GV05brupsb1u:2617: yo vai sa dharmo vyavahāralakṣaṇo laukikairvyavahriyamāṇaḥ satyaṃ vai tat;
GV05brupsb1u:2621: yasmādevaṃ tasmātsatyaṃ yathāśāstraṃ vadantaṃ vyavahārakāla āhuḥ samīpasthā ubhayavivekajñāḥ- dharma vadatīti,
GV05brupsb1u:2623: tathā viparyayeṇa dharma vā laukikaṃ vyavahāraṃ vadantamāhuḥ- satyaṃ vadati,
GV05brupsb1u:2626: tasmātsa dharmo jñānānuṣṭānalakṣaṇaḥ śāstrajñānanitarāṃśca sarvāneva niyamayati /
GV05brupsb1u:2632: tad etad brahma kṣatraṃ viṭ śūdraḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2633: tad agninaiva deveṣu brahmābhavad brāhmaṇo manuṣyeṣu,
GV05brupsb1u:2636: tasmād agnāv eva deveṣu lokam icchante brāhmaṇe manuṣyeṣu |
GV05brupsb1u:2638: atha yo ha vā asmāl lokāt svaṃ lokam adṛṣṭvā praiti sa enam avidito na bhunakti yathā vedo vānanūkto 'nyad vā karmākṛtam |
GV05brupsb1u:2639: yadi ha vā apy anevaṃvin mahatpuṇyaṃ karma karoti tad dhāsyāntataḥ kṣīyata eva |
GV05brupsb1u:2641: sa ya ātmānam eva lokam upāste na hāsya karma kṣīyate |
GV05brupsb1u:2642: asmād dhy evātmano yadyat kāmayate tattat sṛjate || BrhUp_1,4.15 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2645: 4.15 tadetaccāturvarṇyaṃ sṛṣṭam - brahma kṣatraṃ viṭśūdra iti;
GV05brupsb1u:2654: agnau brāhmaṇa e cāvikṛtaṃ sraṣṭṛ brahma,
GV05brupsb1u:2655: tasmādagnāveva deveṣu devānāṃ madhye lokaṃ karmaphalam,
GV05brupsb1u:2658: tasmāt tasminnagnau karma kṛtvā tatphalaṃ prārthayanta ityetadupapannam /
GV05brupsb1u:2659: brahmaṇe manuṣyeṣu - manuṣyāṇāṃ punarmadhye karmaphalecchāyāṃ nāgnyādinimittakriyāpekṣā, kiṃ tarhi?
GV05brupsb1u:2667: yasmādetābhyāṃ hi brāhmaṇāgnirūpābhyāṃ karmakartradhikaraṇarūpābhyāṃ yatsraṣṭṛ brahma sākṣādabhavat /
GV05brupsb1u:2668: atra tu paramātmalokamagnau brāhmaṇe cecchantīti kecit /
GV05brupsb1u:2671: pareṇa ca viśeṣaṇāt;yadi hyatra lokaśabdena para evātmocyeta,
GV05brupsb1u:2680: tacca karma dharmākhyaṃ sarvāneva kartavyatayā niyantṛ puruṣārthasādhanaṃ va /
GV05brupsb1u:2681: tasmāttenaiva cetkarmaṇā svo lokaḥ paramātmākhyo 'vidito 'pi prāpyate,
GV05brupsb1u:2682: kiṃ tasyaiva padanīyatvena kriyata ityata āha-atheti pūrvapakṣavinivṛttyarthaḥ;yaḥ kaścit,
GV05brupsb1u:2683: ha vai asmātsaṃsārikāmakarmahetukādagnyadhīnakarmābhimānatayā vā brāhmaṇajātimātrakarmābhimānatayā vā āgantukādasvabhūtāllokāt,
GV05brupsb1u:2687: avidito 'vidyayā vyavahito 'sva ivājñātaḥ enam - saṅkhyāpūraṇa iva laukika ātmānam na bhunakti na pālayati śokamohabhayādidoṣāpanayena /
GV05brupsb1u:2688: yathā ca loke vedo 'nanukto 'nadhītaḥ karmādyavabodhakatvena na bhunakti,
GV05brupsb1u:2689: anyadvā laukikaṃ kṛṣyādi karmākṛtaṃ svātmanānabhivyañjitam ātmīyaphalapradānena na bhunakti,
GV05brupsb1u:2690: evamātmā svo lokaḥ svenaiva nityātmasvarūpeṇānabhivyañjito 'vidyādi prahāṇena na bhunaktyeva /
GV05brupsb1u:2698: mahadbahu aśvamedhādi puṇyaṃ karma iṣṭaphalameva nairantaryeṇa karoti,
GV05brupsb1u:2706: sa ya ātmānameva lokamupāste, tasya kim?
GV05brupsb1u:2707: ityucyate - na hāsya karma kṣīyate;karmābhāvādeva, iti nityānuvādaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2708: yathāviduṣaḥ karmakṣayalakṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ santatameva,na tathā tadasya vidyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2709: “mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiñcana“iti yadvat /
GV05brupsb1u:2710: svātmalokopāsakasya viduṣo vidyāsaṃyogātkarmaiva na kṣīyata ityapare varṣayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:2711: lokaśabdārthaṃ ca karmasamavāyinaṃ dvidhā parikalpayanti kila eko vyākṛtāvasthā karmāśrayo loko hairaṇyagarbhākhyaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2712: taṃ karmasamavāyinaṃ lokaṃ vyākṛtaṃ paricchinnaṃ ya upāste,
GV05brupsb1u:2718: bhavatīyaṃ śobhanā kalpanā na tu śrautī /
GV05brupsb1u:2720: svaṃ lokamiti prastutya svaśabdaṃ vihāyātmaśabdaprakṣepeṇa punastasyaiva pratinirdeśādātmānameva lokamupāsīteti /
GV05brupsb1u:2722: pareṇa ca kevalavidyāviṣayeṇa viśeṣaṇāt -“kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ“(bṛ.u.4 / 4 / 22) ithi /
GV05brupsb1u:2723: putrakarmāparavidyākṛtebhyo hi lokebhyo viśinaṣṭi'ayamātmā no lokaḥ'iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2724: “na hāsya kenacana karmaṇā loko mīyata eṣo 'sya paramo lokaḥ“iti ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2725: taiḥ saviśeṣaṇairasyaikavākyatā yuktā, ihāpi svaṃ lokamiti viśeṣaṇadarśanāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2726: asmātkāmayata ityayuktamiti cet - iha svo lokaḥ paramātmā,
GV05brupsb1u:2728: yadyatkāmayate tattadasmādātmanaḥ sṛjata ithi tadātmaprāptivyatirekeṇa phalavacanamayuktamiti cet,
GV05brupsb1u:2735: yadi hi para evātmā sampadyate tadā yuktaḥ asmāddhyevātmanaḥ ityātmaśabdaprayogaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2737: anyathā'avyākṛtāvasthātkarmaṇo lokāt'iti saviśeṣaṇamavakṣyāt prakṛtaparamātmalokavyāvṛttaye vyākṛtāvasthāvyāvṛttaye ca /
GV05brupsb1u:2740: atrāvidvān varṇāśramādyabhimāno dharmeṇa niyamyamāno devādikarmakartavyatayā paśuvatparatantra ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2741: kāni punastāni karmāṇi yatkartavyatayā paśuvatparatantro bhavati?
GV05brupsb1u:2742: ke vā te devādayo yeṣāṃ karmabhiḥ paśuvadupakaroti?
GV05brupsb1u:2746: atho ayaṃ vā ātmā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2747: sa yaj juhoti yad yajate tena devānāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2749: atha yat pitṛbhyo nipṛṇāti yat prajām icchate tena pitṝṇām |
GV05brupsb1u:2750: atha yan manuṣyān vāsayate yad ebhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti tena manuṣyāṇām |
GV05brupsb1u:2751: atha yat paśubhyas tṛṇodakaṃ vindati tena paśūnām |
GV05brupsb1u:2752: yad asya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsy ā pipīlikābhya upajīvanti tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2753: yathā ha vai svāya lokāyāriṣṭim icchet |
GV05brupsb1u:2754: evaṃ haivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāny ariṣṭim icchanti |
GV05brupsb1u:2755: tad vā etad viditaṃ mīmāṃsitam || BrhUp_1,4.16 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2758: ayaṃ yaḥ prakṛto gṛhī karmādhikṛto 'vidvāñcharīrendriyasaṅghātādiviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍa ātmetyucyate;
GV05brupsb1u:2760: kaiḥ punaḥ karmaviśeṣairupakurvan keṣāṃ bhūtaviśeṣāṇāṃ lokaḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:2764: sa eva āsecanādhiko homaḥ tena homayāgalakṣaṇena karmaṇāvaśyakartavyatvena devānāṃ paśuvatparatantratvena pratibaddha iti lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2767: yacca prajāmicchati prajārthamudyamaṃ karoti - icchā cotpattyupalakṣaṇārthā - prajāṃ cotpādayatītyarthaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2768: tena karmaṇāvaśyakartavyatvena pitṛṇāṃ bhogyatvena paratantro lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2770: yacca tebhyo vasadbhyo 'vasadbhyo vā arthibhyo 'śanaṃ dadāti,
GV05brupsb1u:2773: yadasya gṛheṣu śvāpadā vayāṃsi ca pipīlikābhiḥ saha kaṇabalibhāṇḍakṣālanādyupajīvanti, tena teṣāṃ lokaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2775: tasmādyathā ha vai loke svāpya lokāya svasmai dehāyāriṣṭamavināśaṃ svatvabhāvāpracyutimicchet svatvabhāvapracyutibhayātpoṣaṇarakṣaṇādibhiḥ sarvataḥ paripālayet,
GV05brupsb1u:2776_1: parikalpitavate sarvāṇi bhūtāni devādīni yathoktāni ariṣṭimavināśamicchanti svatvāpracyutyai
GV05brupsb1u:2776_2: sarvataḥ saṃrakṣanti kuṭumbina iva paśūn -“tasmādeṣāṃ tanna priyam“ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2777: tadvā etattadetadyathoktānāṃ karmaṇām ṛṇavadavaśyakartavyatvaṃ pañcamahāyajñaprakaraṇe viditaṃ kartavyatayā mīmāṃsitaṃ vicāritaṃ cāvadānaprakaraṇe //16//
GV05brupsb1u:2780: na punastadvimokṣṇopāye vidyādhikāra iti nanūktaṃ devā rakṣantīti /
GV05brupsb1u:2782: na tu sāmānyaṃ puruṣamātraṃ viśiṣṭādhikārānārūḍham;tasmādbhavitavyaṃ tena,
GV05brupsb1u:2783: yena prerito 'vaśa eva bahirmukho bhavati svasmāllokāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2792: ityādi, mānave ca sarvā pravṛttiḥ kāmahetukyeveti /
GV05brupsb1u:2793: sa eṣor'thaḥ savistaraḥ pradarśyata iha ā adhyāyaparisamāpteḥ -
GV05brupsb1u:2797: so 'kāmayata jāyā me syād atha prajāyeya |
GV05brupsb1u:2798: atha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:2801: tasmād apy etarhy ekākī kāmayate -- jāyā me syād atha prajāyeyātha vittaṃ me syād atha karma kurvīyeti |
GV05brupsb1u:2802: sa yāvad apy eteṣām ekaikaṃ na prāpnoty akṛtsna eva tāvan manyate |
GV05brupsb1u:2816: pāṅktam idaṃ sarvaṃ yad idaṃ kiñca |
GV05brupsb1u:2817: tad idaṃ sarvam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda || BrhUp_1,4.17 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2824: sa evaika āsīt - jāyādyeṣaṇābījabhūtā vidyāvāneka evāsīt /
GV05brupsb1u:2825: svābhāvikyā svātmani kartrādikārakakriyāphalātmakatādhyāropalakṣaṇayā avidyāvāsanayā vāsitaḥ so 'kāmayata kāmitavān /
GV05brupsb1u:2827: jāyā karmādhikārahetubhūtā me mama kartuḥ syāt;
GV05brupsb1u:2831: atha vittaṃ me syātkarmasādhanaṃ gavādilakṣaṇam athāhamabhyudayaniḥśreyasasādhanaṃ karma kurvīya;
GV05brupsb1u:2835: etāvāneva hi kāmayitavyo viṣayo yaduta jāyāputravittakarmāṇi sādhanalakṣaṇaiṣaṇā;
GV05brupsb1u:2836: lokāśca trayo manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti phalabhūtāḥ sādhanaiṣaṇā,
GV05brupsb1u:2838: saikaiva satyeṣaṇā sādhanāpekṣeti dvidhā;ato 'vadhārayiṣyati“ubhe hyete eṣaṇe eva“3 / 5 / 1) iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2843: yena prayukto 'vidvānavaśa eva kośakāravadātmānaṃ veṣṭayati - karmamārga evātmānaṃ praṇidadhadbahirmukhībhūto na svaṃ lokaṃ pratijānāti /
GV05brupsb1u:2844: tathā ca taittirīyake -“agnimugdho haiva dhūmatāntaḥ svaṃ lokaṃ na pratijānāti“iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2847: ityetadāśaṅkya hetumāha - yasmād na icchan ca na icchannapi,
GV05brupsb1u:2849: na hi loke phalasādhanavyatiriktaṃ dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā labdhavyamasti /
GV05brupsb1u:2850: labdhavyaviṣayo hi kāmaḥ, tasya caitadvyatirekeṇābhāvāt yuktaṃ vaktum'etāvānvai kāmaḥ'iti /
GV05brupsb1u:2851: etaduktaṃ bhavati - dṛṣṭārthamadṛṣṭārtha vā sādhyasādhanalakṣaṇam avidyāvatpuruṣādhikāraviṣayameṣaṇādvayaṃ kāmaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2859: tasmāttatsṛṣṭau etarhyetasminnapi kāla ekākī sanprāgdārakriyātaḥ kāmayate - jāyā me syāt,
GV05brupsb1u:2860: atha prajāyeya atha vittaṃ me syāt,
GV05brupsb1u:2862: sa evaṃ kāmayamānaḥ sampādayaṃśca jāyādīnyāvatsa eteṣāṃ yathoktānāṃ jāyādīnāmekaikamapi na prāpnoti,
GV05brupsb1u:2865: yadā tu na śaknoti kṛtsnatāṃ sampādayituṃ tadā asya kṛtsnatvasampādanāyāha - tasyo tasyākṛtsnatvabhimāninaḥ kṛtsnatā iyam evaṃ bhavati katham?
GV05brupsb1u:2867: tatra mano 'nuvṛtti hi itaratsarvaṃ kāryakaraṇajñātamiti manaḥ pradhānatvājātmevātmā /
GV05brupsb1u:2874: tābhyāṃ ca vāṅmanasābhyāṃ jāyāpatisthānīyābhyāṃ prasūyate prāṇaḥ karmārtham, iti prāṇaḥ prajeva /
GV05brupsb1u:2876: tad dvividhaṃ vittaṃ mānuṣamitaracca;ato viśinaṣṭītaravittanivṛttyartha mānuṣamiti /
GV05brupsb1u:2877: gavādi hi manuṣyasambandhi vittaṃ cakṣurgrāhyaṃ karmasādhanam;tasmāttatsthānīyam,
GV05brupsb1u:2879: cakṣuṣā hi yasmāttanmānuṣaṃ vittaṃ vindate gavādyupalabhata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2882: kasmāt? śrotreṇa hi yasmāttaddaivaṃ vittaṃ vijñānaṃ śṛṇoti;ataḥ śrotrameva taditi /
GV05brupsb1u:2883: kiṃ punaretairātmādivittāntairiha nirvartya karma? ityucyate - ātmaiva - ātmeti śarīramucyate /
GV05brupsb1u:2885: kathaṃ karmahetutvam? ātmanā hi śarīreṇa yataḥ karma karoti /
GV05brupsb1u:2886: tasyākṛtsnatvābhimānina evaṃ kṛtsnatā sampannā - yathā bāhyā jāyādilakṣaṇā evam /
GV05brupsb1u:2887: tasmātsa eṣa pāṅktaḥ pañcabhirnirvṛttaḥ pāṅkto yajño darśanamātranirvṛtto 'karmiṇo 'pi /
GV05brupsb1u:2890: sa ca paśuḥ puruṣaśca pāṅkta eva yathoktamanaādipañcatvayogāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2892: pāṅktaḥ puruṣaḥ paśutve 'pyadhikṛtatvenāsya viśeṣaḥ puruṣasyeti pṛthakpuruṣagrahaṇam /
GV05brupsb1u:2893: kiṃ bahunā? pāṅktamidaṃ sarvaṃ karmasādhanaṃ phalaṃ ca, yadidaṃ kiñca yatkiñcididaṃ sarvam /
GV05brupsb1u:2894: evaṃ pāṅktaṃ yajñamātmānaṃ yaḥ sampādayat sa tadidaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmatvenāpnoti ya evaṃ veda //17//
GV05brupsb1u:2898: sa varṇāśramābhimānaḥ karmakartavyatayā niyato juhotyādikarmabhiḥ kāmaprayukto devādīnāmupakurvansarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ loka ityuktam /
GV05brupsb1u:2899: yathā ca svakarmabhirekaikena sarvairbhūtairasau loko bhojyatvena sṛṣṭaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:2900: evamasāvapi juhotyādipāṅktakarmabhiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvaṃ ca jagadātmabhojyatvenāsṛjat /
GV05brupsb1u:2901: evamekaikaḥ svakarmavidyānurūpyeṇa sarvasya jagato bhoktā bhojyaṃ ca,
GV05brupsb1u:2903: etadeva ca vidyāprakaraṇe madhuvidyāyāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ -'sarvaṃ sarvasya kāryaṃ madhu'ityātmaikatvavijñānārtham /
GV05brupsb1u:2904: yadasau juhotītyādinā pāṅktena kāmyena karmaṇā ātmabhojyatvena jagadasṛjata vijñānena ca,
GV05brupsb1u:2907: eteṣāmannānāṃ saviniyogānāṃ sūtrabhūtāḥ saṅkṣepataḥ prakāśakatvādime mantrāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2911: ekam asya sādhāraṇaṃ dve devān abhājayat |
GV05brupsb1u:2913: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na |
GV05brupsb1u:2914: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadā |
GV05brupsb1u:2915: yo vai tām akṣitiṃ veda so 'nnam atti pratīkena |
GV05brupsb1u:2916: sa devān apigacchati sa ūṛjam upajīvati |
GV05brupsb1u:2922: medhayā prajñayā vijñānena tapasā ca karmaṇā;
GV05brupsb1u:2929: ato yāni saptānnāni jñānakarmabhyāṃ janitavānpitā tāni prakāśayiṣyāma iti vākyaśeṣaḥ //1//
GV05brupsb1u:2930: tatra mantrāṇāmarthastirohitatvāttprāyeṇa durvijñeyo bhavatīti tadarthavyākhyānāya brāhmaṇaṃ pravartate -
GV05brupsb1u:2934: medhayā hi tapasājanayat pitaikam asya sādhāraṇam iti |
GV05brupsb1u:2935: idam evāsya tat sādhāraṇam annaṃ yad idam adyate |
GV05brupsb1u:2936: sa ya etad upāste na sa pāpmano vyāvartate |
GV05brupsb1u:2940: tasmād devebhyo juhvati ca pra ca juhvati |
GV05brupsb1u:2945: payo hy evāgre manuṣyāś ca paśavaś copajīvanti |
GV05brupsb1u:2946: tasmāt kumāraṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vaivāgre pratilehayanti stanaṃ vānudhāpayanti |
GV05brupsb1u:2947: atha vatsaṃ jātam āhus tṛṇād iti |
GV05brupsb1u:2948: tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca neti |
GV05brupsb1u:2949: payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca na |
GV05brupsb1u:2950: tad yad idam āhuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvad apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti |
GV05brupsb1u:2952: yad ahar eva juhoti tad ahaḥ punarmṛtyum apajayaty evaṃ vidvān |
GV05brupsb1u:2954: kasmāt tāni na kṣīyante adyamānāni sarvadeti |
GV05brupsb1u:2956: sa hīdam annaṃ punaḥ punar janayate |
GV05brupsb1u:2959: sa hīdam annaṃ dhiyādhiyā janayate karmabhiḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:2960: yad dhaitan na kuryāt kṣīyeta ha |
GV05brupsb1u:2963: sa devān apigacchati sa ūrjam upajīvatīti praśaṃsā || BrhUp_1,5.2 ||
GV05brupsb1u:2965: BrhUpBh_1,5.2 tatra'yatsaptānnāni medhayā tapasājanayatpitā'ityasya kor'tha ucyate?
GV05brupsb1u:2971: ityucyate - jāyādikarmāntānāṃ lokaphalasādhanānāṃ pitṛtvaṃ tāvat pratyakṣameva,
GV05brupsb1u:2973: tatra ca daivaṃ vittaṃ vidyā karma putraśca phalabhūtānāṃ lokānāṃ sādhanaṃ sraṣṭṛtvaṃ pratītyabhihitam,
GV05brupsb1u:2975: eṣaṇā hi phalaviṣayā prasiddhaiva ca loke /
GV05brupsb1u:2980: vivakṣitastu śāstrīya eva sādhyasādhanabhāvo brahmavidyāvidhitsayā tadvairāgyasya vivakṣitatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:2981: sarvo hyaṃ vyaktāvyaktalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro 'suddho 'nityaḥ sādhyasādhanarūpo duḥkho 'vidyāviṣaya ityetasmādviraktasya brahmavidyā ārabdhavyeti /
GV05brupsb1u:2982: tatrānnānāṃ vibhāgena viniyoga ucyate-'ekamasya sādhāraṇma'iti mantrapadam,
GV05brupsb1u:2987_0: sa ya etatsādhāraṇaṃ sarvaprāṇabhṛtsthitikaraṃ bhujyamānamannamupāste tatparo bhavatītyarthaḥ--
GV05brupsb1u:2987_1: upāsanaṃ hi nāma tātparya dṛṣṭaṃ loke'gurumupāste' 'rājānamupāste'ityādau--tasmāccharīrasthityarthannopabhogapradhānonādṛṣṭārthakarmapradhāna ityarthaḥ;
GV05brupsb1u:2988: sa evaṃ bhūto na pāpmano 'dharmadvayāvartate--na vimucyata ityetat /
GV05brupsb1u:2990: smṛtirapi-“nātmārtha pācayedannam” “apradāyaibhyo yo bhūṅkte stena eva saḥ” “annāde bhrūṇahā mārṣṭi” ityādiḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:2992: miśraṃ hyetasmarseṣāṃ hi svaṃ tadapravibhaktaṃ yatprāṇibhirbhujyate /
GV05brupsb1u:2993: sarvabhojyatpādeva yo mukhe prakṣipyamāṇo 'pi grāsaḥ parasya pīḍākaro dṛśyate,
GV05brupsb1u:2997: gṛhiṇā vaiśvadevākhyamannaṃ yadahanyahani nirūpyata iti kecit,
GV05brupsb1u:3005: yadi hi tanna gṛhyeta, sādhāraṇaśabdena pitrāsṛṣṭatvāviniyuttkatve tasya prasajyeyātām /
GV05brupsb1u:3006: iṣyate hi tatsṛṣṭavaṃ tadviniyuttkatvaṃ ya sarvasyānnajātasya /
GV05brupsb1u:3007: na ca vaiśvadevākhyaṃ śāstroktaṃ karma kurvataḥ pāpmano 'vinivṛttiryuktā,
GV05brupsb1u:3013: dve devānabhājayat iti mantrapadam, ye dve anne sṛṣṭvā devānabhājayat /
GV05brupsb1u:3014: ke te dve? ityucyate - hutaṃ ca prahutaṃ ca /
GV05brupsb1u:3016: yasmād dve ete anne hutaprahute devānabhājayatpitā /
GV05brupsb1u:3019: prajuhvati ca hutvā baliharaṇaṃ ca kurvata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3020: atho apyanya āhurdve anne pitrā devebhyaḥ pratte na hutaprahute, kiṃ tarhi? darśapūrṇamāsāviti /
GV05brupsb1u:3033: paśubhya ekaṃ prāyacchaditi - yatpaśubhya ekaṃ punastadannam? tatpayaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3035: ityata āha - payo hyagre prathamaṃ yasmānmanuṣyāśca paśavaśca payaḥ evopajīvantīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3036: ucitaṃ hi'tapo tadannam'anyathā kathaṃ tadevāgre niyamenopajīveyuḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:3040: tasmātkumāraṃ bālaṃ jātaṃ ghṛtaṃ vā traivarṇikā jātakarmaṇi jātarūpasaṃyuktaṃ pratilehayanti paścāt pāyayanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3042: atha vatsaṃ jātamāhuḥ'kiyatpramāṇo vatsaḥ'? ityevaṃ pṛṣṭā- santo 'tṛṇāda iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3043: nādyāpi tṛṇamatti, atīva bālaḥ, payasaivādyāpi vartata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3047: ghṛtasyāpi payovikāratvātpayastvameva kasmātpunaḥ saptamaṃ satpaśvannaṃ caturthatvena vyākhyāyate? karmasādhanatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3049: tacca karma sādhanaṃ vittasādhyaṃ vakṣyamāṇasyānnatrayasya sādhyasya,

GV05brupsb1u:3054: tasminsarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti yacca netyasya kor'thaḥ?
GV05brupsb1u:3055: ityucyate - tasminpaśvanne payasi sarvamadhyātmādhibhūtādhidaivalakṣaṇaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagatpratiṣṭhitaṃ yacca prāṇiti prāṇaveṣṭāvadyacca na sthānaraṃ śailādi /
GV05brupsb1u:3059: agnihotrādyāhutivipariṇāmātmakaṃ ca jagatkṛtsnamiti śrutismṛtivādāḥ śataśo vyavasthitāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3061: yattadbrāhmaṇāntareṣvidamāhuḥ - saṃvatsaraṃ payasā juhvadapa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti,

GV05brupsb1u:3066: na tathā vidyānna tathā draṣṭavyam;yadahareva juhoti tadahaḥ punarmṛtyumapajayati,
GV05brupsb1u:3069: yaduktam - payasi hīdaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ paya āhutivipariṇāmātmakatvātsarvasyeti,
GV05brupsb1u:3070: tadekenaivāhvā jagadātmatvaṃ pratipadyate;taducyate - apajayati punarmṛtyuṃ punarmaraṇam,
GV05brupsb1u:3071: sakṛnmṛtvāviddhāñcharīreṇa viyujya sarvātmā bhavati na punarmaraṇāya paricchinnaṃ śarīraṃ gṛhṇātītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3073: ityucyate - sarvaṃ samastaṃ hi yasmāddevebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'nnādyamannameva tadādyaṃ ca sāyaṃprātarāhutiprakṣepeṇa prayacchati /
GV05brupsb1u:3074: tadyuktaṃ sarvamāhutimayamātmānaṃ kṛtvā sarvadevānnarūpeṇa sarvairdevairekātmabhāvaṃ gatvā sarvadevamayo bhūtvā punarna mriyata iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3075: athaitadapyuktaṃ brāhmaṇena -“brahma vai svayambhū tapo 'tapyata tadaikṣata na vai tapasyānantyamasti,
GV05brupsb1u:3077: tatsarveṣu bhūteṣvātmānaṃ hutvā bhūtāni cātmani sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyagādhipatyaṃ paryet“iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3079: yadā pitrā annāni sṛṣṭvā sapta pṛthakpṛthagbhoktṛbhiradyagānāni - tannimittatvātteṣāṃ sthiteḥ - sarvadā nairantaryeṇa;

GV05brupsb1u:3084: yathāsau pūrvamannānāṃ sraṣṭāsītpitā medhayā jāyādisambandhena ca pāṅktakarmaṇā bhoktā ca,

GV05brupsb1u:3346: sa vittenaivā ca pūryate 'pa ca kṣīyate |
GV05brupsb1u:3347: tad etan nabhyaṃ yad ayam ātmā |
GV05brupsb1u:3349: tasmād yady api sarvajyāniṃ jīyata ātmanā cej jīvati pradhināgād ity evāhuḥ || BrhUp_1,5.15 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3352: 5.15 yo vai parokṣābhihitaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ ṣoḍaśakalaḥ sa naivātyantaṃ parokṣo mantavyaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3354: ko 'sāvayam? yo yathektaṃ tryannātmakaṃ prajāpatimātmabhūtaṃ vetti sa evaṃvitpuruṣaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3355: kena sāmānyena prajāpatiriti taducyate - tasyaivaṃvidaḥ puruṣasya gavādi vittameva pañcadaśa kalā upacayāpacayadharmitvāt;
GV05brupsb1u:3357: tasya kṛtsnatāyai ātmaiva piṇḍa evāsya viduṣaḥ ṣoḍaśī kalā dhruvasthānīyā /
GV05brupsb1u:3358: sa candravadvittenaivāpūryate cāpakṣīyate ca - tadetalloke prasiddham /
GV05brupsb1u:3359: tadetannabhyam, nābhyai hitaṃ nabhyaṃ nābhiṃ vā arhatīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3362: tasmādyadyapi sarvajyāniṃ sarvasvāpaharaṇaṃ jīyate hīyate glāniṃ prāpnoti,
GV05brupsb1u:3363: ātmanā cakranābhisthānīyena cedyadi jīvati pradhinā bāhyena parivāreṇāyamagātkṣīṇo 'yaṃ yathā cakramaranemivimuktamevamāhuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3365: evaṃ pāṅktena daivavittavidyāsaṃyuktena karmaṇā tryannātmakaḥ prajāpatirbhavatīti vyākhyātam /
GV05brupsb1u:3369: so 'yaṃ putrādīnāṃ sādhanānāṃ sādhyaviśeṣasambandho vaktavya ityuttarakaṇḍikā praṇīyate -
GV05brupsb1u:3372: atha trayo vāva lokā manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko devaloka iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3373: so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva jayyo nānyena karmaṇā |
GV05brupsb1u:3381: traya eva śāstroktasādhanārhā lokāḥ, na nyūnā nādhikā vā /
GV05brupsb1u:3382: ke te? ityucyate - manuṣyalokaḥ pitṛloko deloka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3383: teṣāṃ so 'yaṃ manuṣyalokaḥ putreṇaiva sādhanena jayyo jetavyaḥ sādhyaḥ - yathā ca putreṇa jetavyastathottaratra vakṣyāmaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3386: karmaṇā agnihotrādilakṣaṇena kevalena pitṛloko jetavyo na putreṇa nāpi vidyayā /
GV05brupsb1u:3387: vidyayā devaloko na putreṇa nāpi karmaṇā /
GV05brupsb1u:3388: devaloko vai lokānāṃ trayāṇāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ praśasyatamaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3390: evaṃ sādhyalokatrayaphalabhedena viniyuktāni putrakarmavidyākhyāni trīṇi sādhanāni /
GV05brupsb1u:3394: putrasya tvakriyātmakatvātkena prakāreṇa lokajayahetutvamiti na jñāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3399: yadā praiṣyan manyate 'tha putram āha -- tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ loka iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3400: sa putraḥ pratyāhāhaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'ham loka iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3401: yad vai kiñcānūktaṃ tasya sarvasya brahmety ekatā |
GV05brupsb1u:3402: ye vai ke ca yajñās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yajña ity ekatā |
GV05brupsb1u:3403: ye vai ke ca lokās teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ity ekatā |
GV05brupsb1u:3405: etan mā sarvaṃ sann ayam ito bhunajad iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3408: sa yadaivaṃvid asmāl lokāt praity athaibhir eva prāṇaiḥ saha putram āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3409: sa yady anena kiñcid akṣṇayā kṛtaṃ bhavati tasmād enaṃ sarvasmāt putro muñcati tasmāt putro nāma |
GV05brupsb1u:3411: athainam ete devāḥ prāṇā amṛtā āviśanti || BrhUp_1,5.17 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3413: BrhUpBh_1,5.17 sampratiḥ sampradānam;samprattiriti vakṣyamāṇasya karmaṇo nāmadheyam /
GV05brupsb1u:3414: putro hi svātmavyāpārasampradānaṃ karotyanena prakāreṇa pitā, tena samprattisaṃjñakamidaṃ karma /
GV05brupsb1u:3416: ityāha - sa pitā yadā yasmin kāle praiṣyan mariṣyan mariṣyāmītyapariṣṭādidarśanena manyate,
GV05brupsb1u:3417: atha tadā putramāhūyāha - tvaṃ brahma tvaṃ yajñastvaṃ loka iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3418: sa evamuktaḥ putraḥ pratyāha;sa tu pūrvamevānuśiṣṭo jānāti mayaitatkartavyamiti,
GV05brupsb1u:3419: tenāha - ahaṃ brahmāhaṃ yajño 'haṃ loka ithi /
GV05brupsb1u:3423: tasya sarvasyaiva brahmetyetasminpade ekatā ekatvam yo 'dhyayanavyāpāro mama kartavya āsīdetāvantaṃ kālaṃ vedaviṣayaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3424: sa ita ūrdhvaṃ tvaṃ brahma tvatkartṛko 'stvityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3425: tathā ye vai ke ca yajñā anuṣṭheyāḥ santo mayā anuṣṭhitāścānanuṣṭhitāśca,
GV05brupsb1u:3428: te ita ūrdhvaṃ tvaṃ yajñaḥ - tvatkartṛkā bhavantvityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3429: ye vai ke ca lokā mayā jetavyāḥ santo jitā ajitāśca, teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ loka ityetasminpade ekatā /
GV05brupsb1u:3433: tatremaṃ piturabhiprāyaṃ manvānā ācaṣṭa śrutiḥ - etāvadetatparimāṇaṃ vai idaṃ sarvaṃ yadgṛhiṇā kartavyam,
GV05brupsb1u:3436: etanmā sarvaṃ sannayam - sarvaṃ hīmaṃ bhāraṃ madadhīnaṃ matto 'pacchidya ātamani nidhāya,
GV05brupsb1u:3439: yasmādevaṃ sampannaḥ putraḥ pitaram asmāllokātkartavyatābandhanato mocayiṣyati,
GV05brupsb1u:3441: ata eva hyenaṃ putramanuśāsati, lokyo 'yaṃ naḥ syāditi, pitaraḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3444: atha tadaibhireva prakṛtairvāṅmanaḥprāṇaiḥ putramāviśati putraṃ vyāpnoti /
GV05brupsb1u:3447: ahamasmyanantā vāṅmanaḥprāṇā adhyātmādibhedavistārā ityevaṃ bhāvito hi pitā /
GV05brupsb1u:3448: tasmāttatprāṇānuvṛttitvaṃ piturbhavatīti yuktamuktam - ebhireva prāṇaiḥ saha putramāviśatīt;
GV05brupsb1u:3450: etaduktaṃ bhavati - yasya piturevamanuśiṣṭaḥ putro bhavati so 'sminneva loke vartate putrarūpeṇa,
GV05brupsb1u:3452: tathā ca śrutyantare -“so 'syāyamitara ātmā puṇyebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ pratidhīyate“(ai.u.4 / 4) iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3453: athedānīṃ putranirvacanamāha - sa putro yadi kadācidanena pitrā akṣṇyā koṇacchidrato 'ntarā akṛtaṃ bhavati kartavyam,
GV05brupsb1u:3455: kartavyatārūpātpitrā akṛtāt sarvasmāllokaprāptipratibandharūpātputro muñcati mocayati tatsarvaṃ svayamanutiṣṭhanpūrayitvā /
GV05brupsb1u:3456: tasmātpūraṇena trāyate sa pitaraṃ yasmāttasmātputro nāma /
GV05brupsb1u:3457: idaṃ tatputrasya putratvaṃ yatpituśchidraṃ pūrayitvā trāyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3458: sa pitaivaṃvidhena putreṇa mṛto 'pi sannamṛto 'sminneva loke pratitiṣṭhati,
GV05brupsb1u:3461: na hi vidyākarmaṇī svarūpalābhavyatirekeṇa putravadvyāpārāntarāpekṣayā lokajayahetutvaṃ pratipadyete /
GV05brupsb1u:3462: atha kṛtasamprattikaṃ pitaramenamete vāgādayaḥ prāṇā daivā hairaṇyagarbhā amṛtā amaraṇadharmāṇa āviśanti kathamiti vakṣyati pṛthivyai cainamityādi /
GV05brupsb1u:3463: evaṃ putrakarmāparavidyānāṃ manuṣyalokapitṛlokadeva lokasādhyārthatā pradarśitā śrutyā svayameva /
GV05brupsb1u:3466: vakṣyati ca -“kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ” (4 / 4 / 22) iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3468: tasmātputrakarmāparavidyābhiḥ samucityānuṣṭhitābhistribhya etebhyo lokebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ paramātmavijñānena mokṣamadhigacchatīti paramparayā mokṣārthānyeva putrādisādhanānīcchanti /
GV05brupsb1u:3469: teṣāmapi mukhāpidhānāyeyameva śrutiruttarā kṛtasamprattikasya putriṇaḥ karmiṇaḥ tryannātmavidyāvidaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3475: 'punaḥ punarjanayate'iti darśanāt; 'yaddhaitanna kuryātkṣīyeta ha'iti ca kṣayaśravaṇāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3478: na cedameva sādhanatrayaṃ saṃhataṃ satkasyacinmokṣārthaṃ kasyacit tryannātmaphalamityasmādeva vākyādavagantu śakyam,
GV05brupsb1u:3482: pṛthivyai cainam agneś ca daivī vāg āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3483: sā vai daivī vāg yayā yad yad eva vadati tat tad bhavati || BrhUp_1,5.18 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3486: 5.18 pṛthivyai pṛthivyāḥ ca enam agneśca daivī adhidaivātmikā vāgenaṃ kṛtasamprattikamāviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3487: sarveṣāṃ hi vāca upādānabhūtā daivī vākpṛthivyagnilakṣaṇā, sā hyādhyātmikāsaṅgādidoṣairniruddhā /
GV05brupsb1u:3491: yayā vācā daivyā yadyadeva ātmane parasmai vā vadati tattadā bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:3496: divaś cainam ādityāc ca daivaṃ mana āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3497: tad vai daivaṃ mano yenānandy eva bhavaty atho na śocati || BrhUp_1,5.19 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3500: 5.19 divaścainamādityācca daivaṃ mana āviśati - tacca daivaṃ manaḥ;
GV05brupsb1u:3502: yena manasā asau ānandyeva bhavati sukhyeva bhavati;atho api na śocati,
GV05brupsb1u:3507: adbhyaś cainaṃ candramasaś ca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati |
GV05brupsb1u:3508: sa vai daivaḥ prāṇo yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brupsb1u:3509: sa eṣa evaṃvit sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātmā bhavati |
GV05brupsb1u:3511: yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanty evaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāny avanti |
GV05brupsb1u:3512: yad u kiñcemāḥ prajāḥ śocanty amaivāsāṃ tad bhavati |
GV05brupsb1u:3514: na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati || BrhUp_1,5.20 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3516: BrhUpBh_1,5.20 adbhayaścainaṃ candramasaśca daivaḥ prāṇa āviśati /
GV05brupsb1u:3518: ityucyate-yaḥ sañcaran prāṇibhedeṣva sañcaransamaṣṭivya ṣṭirūpeṇa--athavā sañcarana jaṅgameṣu asañcaransthāvareṣu,
GV05brupsb1u:3519: na vyathate na duḥkhanimittena bhayena yuḍyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3520: athāṃ api na riṣyati na vinaśyati na hiṃsāmāpadyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3521: saḥ--yo yathoktamevaṃ vetti vyannātmadarśanaṃ saḥ-sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ prāṇo bhavati,
GV05brupsb1u:3523: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāgbhavati-ityevaṃ sarvābhūtātmatayā sarvajño bhavatītyarthaḥ;sarvakṛcca /
GV05brupsb1u:3524: tathaipā pūrvasidvā hiraṇyagarbhadevatā evameva nāsya sarvajñatve sarvakṛttave vā kkacitpratighātaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3526: kiñca yathaitāṃd diraṇyagarbhadevatāmijyādibhiḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti pālayanti pūjyanti,
GV05brupsb1u:3527: evaṃ ha evaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti-ijyādilakṣaṇāṃ pūjāṃ satataṃ prayapañjata ityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3531: aparicchinnabudvitvāt paricchinnātmabudvīnāṃ hyākrośādau duḥkhasambandho dṛṣṭaḥ- anenāhamākruṣṭa iti /
GV05brupsb1u:3532: asya tu sarvātmano ya ākruśyate yaścākrośati yatorātmatvabudviviśeṣābhāvānna tannimittaṃ duḥkhamupapadyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3533: maraṇaduḥkhavacca nimittābhāvāt yathā hi kasmiṃścinmṛte kasyacid duḥkhamutpadyate-mamāsauputrobhrātāceti,
GV05brupsb1u:3536: tadetaducyate-yadu kiñcayat kiñca imāḥ prajāḥ śocantyamaiva sahaiva prajābhistacchokādinimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃyuktaṃ bhavatyāsāṃ prajānāṃ paricchinnabudvijanitatvāt /
GV05brupsb1u:3537: sarvātmanastu kena saha kiṃ saṃyukta bhavedviyukta vā?
GV05brupsb1u:3538: amuṃ tu prājāpatye pade vartamānaṃ puṇyameva śubhamevaphalamabhipretaṃ puṇyamiti-niratiśayaṃ hi tena puṇyaṃ kṛtam;
GV05brupsb1u:3540: na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati, pāpaphalasyāvasarābhāvāt pāpaphalaṃ duḥkha na gacchatītyathaḥ //20//
GV05brupsb1u:3541: 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ'ityaviśeṣeṇa vāṅmanaḥprāṇānāmupāsanamuktam,
GV05brupsb1u:3544: kiṃ vā vicāryamāṇe kaścidviśeṣo vratamupāsanaṃ prati pratitapattuṃ śakyate? ityucyate-
GV05brupsb1u:3560: athemam eva nāpnot yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:3562: ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ saṃcaraṃś cāsaṃcaraṃś ca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati |
GV05brupsb1u:3566: tena ha vāva tat kulam ācakṣate yasmin kule bhavati ya evaṃ veda |
GV05brupsb1u:3568: anuśuṣya haivāntato mriyata ity adhyātmam || BrhUp_1,5.21 ||
GV05brupsb1u:3571: eṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ kasya karma vratatvena dhārayitavyamiti mīmāṃsā pravartate /
GV05brupsb1u:3572_0: tatra prajāpatirha - haśabdaḥ kilārthe - prajāpatiḥ kila prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā karmāṇi karaṇāni
GV05brupsb1u:3572_1: vāgādīni - karmāthāni hi tānīti karmāṇītyucyante - sasṛje sṛṣṭavānvāgādīni karaṇānītyarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3573: tāni punaḥ sṛṣṭānyanyonyena itaretaramaspardhanta spardhāṃ saṃgharṣaṃ cakruḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3575: vadiṣyāmyeva svavyāpārādvadanādanuparataivāhaṃ syāmiti vāgvrataṃ dadhre dhṛtavatī - yadyanyo 'pi matsamo 'sti svavyāpārādanuparantuṃ śaktaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3578: śroṣyāmyahamiti śrotram;evamanyāni karmāṇi karaṇāni yathākarma - yadyadyasya karma yathākarma /
GV05brupsb1u:3579: tāni karaṇāni mṛtyurmārakaḥ śramaḥ śramarūpī bhūtvā upayeme sañjagrāha /
GV05brupsb1u:3580: katham? tāni karaṇāni svavyāpāre pravṛttānyāpnot, śramarūpeṇātmānaṃ darśitavān /
GV05brupsb1u:3581: āptvā ca tānyavārundha avarodhaṃ kṛtavānmṛtyuḥ - svakarmabhyaḥ pracyāvitavānityarthaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3582: tasmādadyatve 'pi vadane svakarmaṇi pravṛttā vāk śrāmyatvena śramarūpiṇā mṛtyunā saṃyuktā svakarmataḥ pracyavate /
GV05brupsb1u:3584: athemameva mukhyaṃ prāṇaṃ nāpnonna prāptavānmṛtyuḥ śramarūpī, yo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇastam /
GV05brupsb1u:3586: tānītarāṇi karaṇāni taṃ jñātuṃ dadhrire dhṛtavanti manaḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3587: ayaṃ vai no 'smākaṃ madhye śreṣṭhaḥ praśasyatamo 'bhyadhikaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3588_0: yasmādyaḥ sañcaraṃścāsañcaraṃśca na vyathate 'tho na riṣyati - hantedānīmasyaiva
GV05brupsb1u:3588_1: prāṇasya sarve vayaṃ rūpamasāma prāṇamātmatvena pratipadyemahi - evaṃ viniścitya
GV05brupsb1u:3590: prāṇavratameva dadhrire - asmadvratāni na mṛtyorvāraṇāya paryāptānīti /
GV05brupsb1u:3591: yasmātprāṇena rūpeṇa rūpavantītarāṇi karaṇāni calanātmanā svena ca prakāśātmanaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3594: tasmādete vāgādaya etena prāṇābhidhānena ākhyāyante 'bhidhīyante prāṇā ityevam /
GV05brupsb1u:3595: ya evaṃ prāṇātmatāṃ sarvakaraṇānāṃ vetti prāṇaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ ca,
GV05brupsb1u:3596: tena ha vāva tenaiva viduṣā tatkulamācakṣate laukikāḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3597: yasminkule sa vidvāñjāto bhavati tatkulaṃ vidvāñjāto bhavati tatkulaṃ vidvannāmnaiva prathitaṃ bhavatyamuṣyadaṃ kulamiti,
GV05brupsb1u:3599: ya evaṃ yathoktaṃ veda vāgādīnāṃ prāṇarūpatāṃ prāṇākhyatvaṃ ca tasyaitatphalam /
GV05brupsb1u:3600: kiñca yaḥ kaścidu haivaṃvidā prāṇātmadarśinā spardhate tatpratipakṣī san,
GV05brupsb1u:3602: anuśuṣya haiva śoṣaṃ gatvaiva antato 'nte mriyate na sahasānupadruto mriyate ityaivamuktamadhyātmaṃ prāṇātmadarśanamityuktopasaṃhāro 'dhidaivatapradarśanārthaḥ //21//
GV05brupsb1u:3610: sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evam etāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:3611: mlocanti hy anyā devatā na vāyuḥ |
GV05brupsb1u:3615: kasya devatāviśeṣasya vratadhāraṇaṃ śreyaḥ? iti mīmāsyate /
GV05brupsb1u:3619: so 'dhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāmeṣāṃ prāṇo mṛtyunā anāptaḥ svakarmaṇo na pracyāvitaḥ svena prāṇavratenābhagnavrato yathā;
GV05brupsb1u:3621: mlocantyastaṃ yanti svakarmebhya uparamante - yathādhyātmaṃ vāgādayo 'nyā devatā agnyādyāḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3622: na vāyurastaṃ yāti - yathā madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ,
GV05brupsb1u:3623: ataḥ saiṣā anastamitā devatā yadvāyuryo 'yaṃ vāyuḥ /
GV05brupsb1u:3624: evamadhyātmamadhidaivaṃ ca mīmāṃsitvā nirdhāritam - prāṇavāyyvātmano vratamabhagnamiti //22//
GV05brupsb1u:3628: yataś codeti sūryo 'staṃ yatra ca gacchatīti |
GV05brupsb1u:3629: prāṇād vā eṣa udeti prāṇe 'stam eti |
GV05brupsb1u:3630: taṃ devāś cakrire dharmaṃ sa evādya sa u śva iti |
GV05brupsb1u:3631: yad vā ete 'murhy adhriyanta tad evāpy adya kurvanti |
GV05brupsb1u:3632: tasmād ekam eva vrataṃ caret prāṇyāc caivāpānyāc ca |
